issue.title: [CF 426] Text Output -> Floating Combat Text
issue.body:
I know there is already support for outputting text to the popular scrolling combat text addons, but I think it would be nice to add support for outputting text to the default floating combat text for the people who dislike the other addons.

CombatText_AddMessage() should be able to do the job. I'm not certain what library it is part of(LibSink?), but it works well for the job.


> Posted by CurseForge user pvtschlag | Imported from CurseForge issue #426 | Raw

comments.body:
CombatText_AddMessage (and Floating Combat Text) is a blizzard feature. LibSink allows for addons to easily output text to many different destinations. I don't use it, however, because the configuration is intended for use with Ace3 configuration UIs, but TMW doesn't use Ace3 for icon configuration - only group/profile config.

TL;DR: I'll look into getting this implemented.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
